content: काहल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Dry, withered. {@--2@} Mischievous. {@--3@} Excessive, spacious, large. --लः {@--1@} A cat. {@--2@} A cock. {@--3@} A crow. {@--4@} A sound in general. --लं {@--1@} Indistinct speech. {@--2@} A kind of musical instrument; <ls>Śi. 18. 54.</ls> --लं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Very much, excessively; <ls>Śi. 18. 54.</ls> --ला A large drum (military). --ली A young woman. --लः, --ला, --लं A horn.
